\ 00770 break; \ 00771 case IEC_T_POINTER: \ 00772 *((pointer_t*)(data)) = val; \ 00773 break; 00774 #else 00775 #define SVT_64(data, val) 00776 #endif 00785 #define iec_set_fromvoid(data, val) \ 00786 switch ((data)->type) { \ 00787 case IEC_T_F_EDGE: \ 00788 case IEC_T_R_EDGE: \ 00789 case IEC_T_BOOL: \ 00790 *((bool*)((data)->value)) = *((bool*)val); \ 00791 break; \ 00792 case IEC_T_SINT: \ 00793 *((int8_t*)((data)->value)) = *((int8_t*)val); \ 00794 break; \ 00795 case IEC_T_USINT: \ 00796 case IEC_T_BYTE: \ 00797 *((uint8_t*)((data)->value)) = *((uint8_t*)val); \ 00798 break; \ 00799 case IEC_T_INT: \ 00800 *((int16_t*)((data)->value)) = *((int16_t*)val); \ 00801 break; \ 00802 case IEC_T_UINT: \ 00803 case IEC_T_WORD: \ 00804 *((uint16_t*)((data)->value)) = *((uint16_t*)val); \ 00805 break; \ 00806 case IEC_T_DINT: \ 00807 *((int32_t*)((data)->value)) = *((int32_t*)val); \ 00808 break; \ 00809 case IEC_T_UDINT: \ 00810 case IEC_T_DWORD: \ 00811 *((uint32_t*)((data)->value)) = *((uint32_t*)val); \ 00819 case IEC_T_TIME: \ 00820 *((double*)((data)->value)) = *((double*)val); \ 00821 break; \ 00822 case IEC_T_CHAR: \ 00823 *((char*)((data)->value)) = *((char*)val); \ 00824 break; \ 00825 case IEC_T_WCHAR: \ 00826 *((wchar_t*)((data)->value)) = *((wchar_t*)val); \ 00827 break; \ 00828 SFV_64 \ 00829 default: \ 00830 (data)->value = NULL; \ 00831 } 00832 #ifdef ALLOW_64BITS 00833 #define SFV_64 \ 00834 case IEC_T_ULINT: \ 00835 *((uint64_t*)((data)->value)) = *((uint64_t*)val); \ 00836 break; \ 00837 case IEC_T_LINT: \ 00838 case IEC_T_LWORD: \ 00839 *((int64_t*)((data)->value)) = *((int64_t*)val); \ 00840 break; \ 00841 case IEC_T_POINTER: \ 00842 *((pointer_t*)((data)->value)) = *((pointer_t*)val); \ 00843 break; 00844 #else 00845 #define SFV_64 00846 #endif 00854 #define IEC_ANYTYPE(type) \ 00855 (ANY_NUM(type)) \ 00856 | (ANY_DATE(type) << 1) \ 00857 | (ANY_BIT(type) << 2) \ 00858 | (ANY_REAL(type) << 3) \ 00859 | (ANY_STRING(type) << 4) \ 00860 | (ANY_ELEMENTARY(type) << 5) \ 00861 | (ANY_MAGNITUDE(type) << 6) \ 00862 | (ANY_INT(type) << 7) \ 00863 | (ANY_INTEGRAL(type) << 8) \ 00864 | (ANY_UNSIGNED(type) << 9) \ 00865 | (ANY_SIGNED(type) << 10) \ 00866 | (ANY_CHAR(type) << 11) \ 00867 | (ANY_CHARS(type) << 12) 00868 00874 #define iec_anytype_allowed(data, A, B, C, D, E, F) \ 00875 if((data) == NULL || !((data)->any_type & (A ## _BIT | B ## _BIT | C ## _BIT | D ## _BIT | E ## _BIT | F ## _BIT))) \ 00876 return IEC_NAT 00877 00883 #define iec_type_allowed(data, A) \ 00884 if(data == NULL || !((data)->type == (A))) \ 00885 return IEC_NAT 00886 00887 // TODO: INCOMPLETE! 00893 #define iec_fit(data, value) \ 00894 ((data)->type == IEC_T_BOOL) \ 00895 || ((data)->type == IEC_T_F_EDGE) \ 00896 || ((data)->type == IEC_T_R_EDGE) ? (value >= UCHAR_MIN) && (value <= UCHAR_MAX) && (round(val) == value) : \ 00897 ((data)->type == IEC_T_SINT) ? (value >= SCHAR_MIN) && (value <= SCHAR_MAX) && (round(val) == value) : \ 00898 ((data)->type == IEC_T_USINT \ 00899 || (data)->type == IEC_T_BYTE) ? (value >= UCHAR_MIN) && (value <= UCHAR_MAX) && (round(val) == value) : \ 00900 ((data)->type == IEC_T_INT) ? (value >= INT_MIN) && (value <= INT_MAX) && (round(val) == value) : \ 00901 ((data)->type == IEC_T_UINT) \ 00902 || ((data)->type == IEC_T_WORD) ? (value >= UINT_MIN) && (value <= UINT_MAX) && (round(val) == value) : \ 00903 ((data)->type == IEC_T_DINT) ? (value >= LONG_MIN) && (value <= LONG_MAX) && (round(val) == value) : \ 00904 ((data)->type == IEC_T_UDINT) \ 00905 || ((data)->type == IEC_T_DWORD) ? (value >= ULONG_MIN) && (value <= ULONG_MAX) && (round(val) == value) : \ 00906 ((data)->type == IEC_T_REAL) ? 0 : \ 00907 ((data)->type == IEC_T_TIME) ? 0 : \ 00908 ((data)->type == IEC_T_LREAL) ? 0 : \ 00909 FT_64(data) 00910 #ifdef ALLOW_64BITS 00911 #define FT_64(data) \ 00912 ((data)->type == IEC_T_ULINT) ? 0 : \ 00913 ((data)->type == IEC_T_LINT) \ 00914 || ((data)->type == IEC_T_LWORD) ? 0 : \ 00915 ((data)->type == IEC_T_POINTER) ? 0 : \ 00916 0 00917 #else 00918 #define FT_64(data) 0 00919 #endif 00920 00926 #define iec_timer(v) ((t_timer_t*)((v)->value)) 00928 00936 static inline void iec_new_value(void **nw, iectype_t type) { 00937 switch (type) { 00938 case IEC_T_F_EDGE: 00939 case IEC_T_R_EDGE: 00940 case IEC_T_BOOL: 00941 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(bool)); 00942 break; 00943 00944 case IEC_T_SINT: 00945 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(int8_t)); 00946 break; 00947 00948 case IEC_T_USINT: 00949 case IEC_T_BYTE: 00950 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(uint8_t)); 00951 break; 00952 00953 case IEC_T_INT: 00954 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(int16_t)); 00955 break; 00956 00957 case IEC_T_UINT: 00958 case IEC_T_WORD: 00959 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(uint16_t)); 00960 break; 00961 00962 case IEC_T_DINT: 00963 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(int32_t)); 00964 break; 00965 00966 case IEC_T_UDINT: 00967 case IEC_T_DWORD: 00968 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(uint32_t)); 00969 break; 00970 00971 case IEC_T_REAL: 00972 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(float)); 00973 break; 00974 00975 case IEC_T_LREAL: 00976 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(double)); 00977 break; 00978 00979 case IEC_T_TIME: 00980 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(double)); 00981 break; 00982 00983 case IEC_T_DATE: 00984 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(date_t)); 00985 break; 00986 00987 case IEC_T_TOD: 00988 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(tod_t)); 00989 break; 00990 00991 case IEC_T_CHAR: 00992 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(char)); 00993 break; 00994 00995 case IEC_T_WCHAR: 00996 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(wchar_t)); 00997 break; 00998 00999 case IEC_T_STRING: 01000 case IEC_T_WSTRING: 01001 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(string_t)); 01002 break; 01003 #ifdef ALLOW_64BITS 01004 case IEC_T_DT: 01005 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(dat_t)); 01006 break; 01007 01008 case IEC_T_ULINT: 01009 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(uint64_t)); 01010 break; 01011 01012 case IEC_T_LINT: 01013 case IEC_T_LWORD: 01014 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(int64_t)); 01015 break; 01016 01017 case IEC_T_POINTER: 01018 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(pointer_t)); 01019 break; 01020 #endif 01021 case IEC_T_TABLE: 01022 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(table_t)); 01023 break; 01024 01025 case IEC_T_USER: 01026 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(user_t)); 01027 break; 01028 case IEC_T_TIMER: 01029 (*nw) = malloc(sizeof(t_timer_t)); 01030 break; 01031 01032 default: 01033 (*nw) = NULL; 01034 break; 01035 } 01036 } 01037 01045 static inline void iec_init(iec_t *nw, iectype_t type) { 01046 (*nw)->type = type; 01047 (*nw)->any_type = IEC_ANYTYPE(type); 01048 (*nw)->tt = 0; 01049 iec_new_value(&((*nw)->value), type); 01050 } 01051 01058 static inline void iec_free_value(iec_t *var) { 01059 if ((*var) == NULL) 01060 return; 01061 if ((*var)->type != IEC_T_NULL) 01062 free((*var)->value); 01063 } 01064 01071 static inline void iec_deinit(iec_t *var) { 01072 iec_free_value(var); 01073 free(*var); 01074 } 01075 01083 static inline void iec_totype(iec_t *data, uint8_t tpy) { 01084 void *_tmp_ = NULL; 01085 uint8_t tp_old = (*data)->type; 01086 01087 if (ANY_NUM(tp_old) || ANY_BOOL(tp_old)) { 01088 iec_new_value(&_tmp_, tp_old); 01089 iec_set_value_type(_tmp_, iec_get_value(*data), tp_old); 01090 } 01091 01092 (*data)->type = tpy; 01093 (*data)->any_type = IEC_ANYTYPE(tpy); 01094 01095 iec_free_value(data); 01096 if (!ANY_STRING(tp_old)) { 01097 iec_new_value(&((*data)->value), tpy); 01098 } 01099 01100 if (ANY_NUM(tp_old) || ANY_BOOL(tp_old)) { 01101 iec_set_value((*data), iec_get_value_type(_tmp_, tp_old)); 01102 free(_tmp_); 01103 } 01104 } 01105 01113 static inline void iec_type_promote(iec_t *data, uint8_t tpy) { 01114 if ((*data)->type < tpy) { 01115 iec_totype(data, tpy); 01116 } 01117 } 01118 01119 #endif /* IEC61131LIB_H_ */
